title: What Can the NBA Draft Learn From the NFL Draft? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by Kevin O’Connor to discuss the differences between the NBA and NFL drafts, and what the NBA can adapt from the NFL’s draft to improve upon its own (03:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Kevin O’Connor
Associate Producer: Erika Cervantes
Production Assistant: Jonathan Kermah
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
